original: byed pa po yongs su dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su dag pas byed pa po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pas byed pa po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /

analyzed: byed pa po yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: they are not divided, not discriminated.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: byed pa po yongs su dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: “Lord, how is form pure?🔽How is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness pure?”🔽“Subhūti, form is empty.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty.🔽Subhūti, form is isolated.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are isolated.🔽Subhūti, form is void.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are void.🔽Subhūti, form is not bound and not liberated.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not bound and not liberated.🔽Subhūti, form is not a thing and not a non-thing.

original: tshor ba po yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: tshor ba po yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not a thing and not a non-thing.🔽Subhūti, form is not defiled and not purified.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not defiled and not purified.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do ////
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do ////
translated: Subhūti, form is not diminished and not increased.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not diminished and not increased.🔽Subhūti, form is not appropriated and not unappropriated.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not appropriated and not unappropriated.🔽Subhūti, form is not bound to the past, future, or present.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not bound to the past, future, or present.🔽Subhūti, form is not internal and not external.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not internal and not external.🔽Subhūti, form is not past, not future, and

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

translated: the purity of the seer and the purity of the formless absorptions are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mthong ba po yongs su dag pas rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su dag pa /
translated: nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the seer is the purity of the eight deliverances.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the one who sees is purified and the eight liberations are purified.🔽In this, there is no duality.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi @290a *//
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi @290a *//
translated: Do not discriminate!

original: dad do // mthong ba po yongs su dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: dad do // mthong ba po yongs su dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pa /
translated: The one who sees is purified and the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are purified.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The nine serial steps of meditative absorption are purified and the one who sees is purified.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the one who sees is purified and the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are purified.🔽In this, there is no duality.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Do not discriminate!

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa /
translated: The one who sees is purified and the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation are purified.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the one who sees is the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽the purity of the one who sees and the purity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽“The purity of the one who sees is the purity of the higher knowledges.

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mthong ba po yongs su dag pas mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa /
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.”🔽“Lord, the purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.

analyzed: mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽In this way,🔽the purity of the perfection of giving and the purity of the perfection of morality are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.

original: de ltar na; mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na; mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the perfection of patience are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance and the purity of the perfection of concentration are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.”🔽“Lord, the purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of generosity.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag @290b pas ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa /
translated: Since the seer is pure, meditative stabilization is pure.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /🔽mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the seer and the purity of meditative stabilization are not dual and cannot be made dual; they are not distinct and are not non-distinct.

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa /
translated: Since the seer is pure, the dhāraṇī gateways are pure.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the seer and the purity of the dhāraṇī gateways are not dual and cannot be made dual; they are not distinct and are not non-distinct.

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa /

analyzed: de ltar na / mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na / mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the seer and the purity of fearlessness are not two but indivisible.

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa / so so yang dag par rig @291a *//

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the great love is the purity of the one who sees.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

translated: the purity of the one who sees and the purity of the great love are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa /

analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the one who sees and the purity of the great compassion are indivisible.

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: There is no duality here, only a non-differentiation of the purified.🔽The eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are purified by the purification of the seer.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mthong ba po yongs su dag @291b pas thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa /
translated: There is no duality here, only a non-differentiation of the purified.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is purified by the purification of the seer.

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /

analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not two, and cannot be made two.

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pas mthong ba po yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mthong ba po yongs su dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the one who sees and the purity of the knowledge of the aspects of the path are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, and cannot be made two.

translated: the purity of desire and the purity of old age and death are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they discriminated, nor are they many.

original: 'dod chags rnam par dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags rnam par dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of desire is the purity of the perfection of giving.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of desire.

original: de ltar na /🔽'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of desire and the purity of the perfection of giving are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they discriminated, nor are they many.
